name: Zenburn theme for Google's Inbox
description:
Class names are minified differently for each server, so you won't have the theme working, most likely... Fixing soon Â©

Zenburn palette applied to Google's Inbox.

Version 0.9.3 - February, Wednesday the 4th

  • Add support for secondary background in bundles

Version 0.9.2 - February, Tuesday the 3rd

  • Add support for attachments
  • Add support for email widget
  • Change delimiters color

Version 0.9.1 - February, Sunday the 1st

  • Add support for left-side menu
  • Add support for bundle labels
  • Fix read/unread strings
  • Prettify code

Version 0.9.0 - January, Friday the 30th

  • Initial release
css:
@-moz-document domain("inbox.google.com") {

/* General */
body                   { background: #2B2B2B; }                  /* Background */
.bN, .bN .ay, .bN .an  { background: #7F9F7F; }                  /* Top bar (done) */
.bJ, .bJ .ay, .bJ .an  { background: #7CB8BB; }                  /* Top bar (inbox) */
.bj, .bj .ay, .bj .an  { background: #D0BF8F; }                  /* Top bar (snoozed) */
.an::before            { display: none; }                        /* Top bar (left gradiant) */
.bI, .bI.bO            { background: #6CA0A3; }                  /* Top bar (pinned items toggler) */
.fP, .ne>.fP           { background: #5C888B; }                  /* Top bar (pinned items toggler background) */

/* Left menu */
.kl                    { background: #DCDCCC; color: #6F6F6F; }  /* Background */
.kp                    { border-color: #FFFFEF; }                /* Delimiter */
.eL, .eS               { font-weight: normal; }                  /* Entries */
.i8.fPQ69c             { color: #7F9F7F; }                       /* Active entry (inbox) */
.qR.fPQ69c             { color: #7CB8BB; }                       /* Active entry (inbox) */
.mM.fPQ69c             { color: #D0BF8F; }                       /* Active entry (snoozed) */

/* Bottom right buttons */
.gH                    { background: #9C6363; }                  /* Compose */
.gQ                    { background: #D0BF8F; }                  /* Invite */
.na                    { background: #94BFF3; }                  /* Reminder */

/* Cards */
.section-header>div          { background: #2B2B2B; color: #7F9F7F; }      /* Header */
.scroll-list-item > div:nth-of-type(5)           { background: #3F3F3F; }                  /* Background */
.aq, .aq .Y-bL-bA      { background: #4F4F4F !important; }       /* Secondary background */

/* Items */
.scroll-list-item-highlighted>.G::before {
  background: #5F7F5F;
}                  /* Active */
.scroll-list-item > div:nth-of-type(5) > div:nth-of-type(2) > div {                   /* Delimiter */
  background: #2B2B2B;
}
.aq .lB                { background: #4F4F4F; }                  /* Secondary delimiter */
.iw, .hy               { color: #6F6F6F; font-weight: normal; }  /* Read */
.qt, .oH, .oH + .hy    { color: #DCDCCC; font-weight: normal; }  /* Unread */
.oq                    { color: inherit; }                       /* Item count */
.pI                    { background: rgba(51,51,51,1); }         /* Label (background) */
.o2                    { color: #5F7F5F; font-weight: normal; }  /* Label (finance) */
.ot                    { color: #94BFF3; font-weight: normal; }  /* Label (forums) */
.qf, .iU               { color: #93E0E3; font-weight: normal; }  /* Label (promos) */
.jO                    { color: #D0BF8F; font-weight: normal; }  /* Label (purchases) */
.qS                    { color: #AC7373; font-weight: normal; }  /* Label (social) */
.ms                    { color: #DFAF8F; font-weight: normal; }  /* Label (updates) */
.nn                    { color: #D0BF8F; }                       /* Snooze date */
.fs, .by               { background: #4F4F4F; }                  /* Attachment (background) */
.p1, .oa               { color: #6F6F6F !important; }            /* Attachment (title) */
.fA, .ge               { background: #DCDCCC; }                  /* Attachment (arrow) */

/* Emails */
.T, .bS, .bS:hover, .bb>.bS, .V-M .bs, .nl
                       { background: #DCDCCC !important; }       /* Background */
.ag, .bS, .k4, .me::before, .me::after
                       { border-top-color: #FFFFEF; }            /* Delimiter */
.fJ                    { background: #8C5353; }                  /* Conversation length counter */

}
